internal.database

Class Conversions

  • java.lang.Object
    • internal.database.Conversions

  • public class Conversions
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods for converting Java's primitive data types into byte arrays.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Conversions()
